posts.post_content:
Good News!!  
With the new [Memnite](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Memnite)s in Scars, the [Ornithopter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ornithopter)s from M11, combining this and [Argentum Armor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Argentum Armor), you can swing turn two with a 6/8 [Ornithopter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ornithopter), or a 7/7 [Memnite](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Memnite)!!  
. . .  
Okay, though that may be HIGHLY unlikely, it's still worth a shot, ya know...

posts.post_content:
Please note that there are no activation restrictions.  
You are not required to immediately fetch an equipment when you reach 5 counters.  
You are not required to remove 5 counters and sacrifice as a sorcery.  
So this turns into an instant-speed silver bullet equipment tutor. Like, for instance, putting [Elbrus, the Binding Blade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elbrus, the Binding Blade) on an unblocked attacker.
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
Five counters is a lot, but for one mana it's not too shabby. Maybe get two of these out with a few [Kor Duelist](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kor Duelist)s and [Kor Skyfisher](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kor Skyfisher)s to trigger that quest counter every turn for as many as possible.   
  
Then when you get something like an[Armament Master](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Armament Master) out, you can sac the card and immediatly put something nice on him. Or maybe do it twice over.

posts.post_content:
@SeiberTross: Unfortunately, you're not swinging with an equipped Ornithopter/Memnite on turn 1.  
  
Turn 1 swing is possible with a perfect hand but only if you're on the draw.  
Opening hand:  
[Chancellor of the Forge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Chancellor of the Forge)  
Plains  
Quest for the Holy Relic  
[Memnite](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Memnite) x2  
[Glint Hawk](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Glint Hawk)  
[Mox Opal](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mox Opal)  
  
Turn 0: Reveal Chancellor and get a goblin.  
Turn 1: Draw a third memnite. Play plains and drop Quest, unload all three Memnites and Mox Opal, cast Glint Hawk, bounce and replay Memnite, pop the quest to suit up the goblin, swing.
posts.html:
@SeiberTross: Unfortunately, you're not swinging with an equipped Ornithopter/Memnite on turn 1.

Turn 1 swing is possible with a perfect hand but only if you're on the draw.
Opening hand:
Chancellor of the Forge
Plains
Quest for the Holy Relic
Memnite x2
Glint Hawk
Mox Opal

Turn 0: Reveal Chancellor and get a goblin.
Turn 1: Draw a third memnite. Play plains and drop Quest, unload all three Memnites and Mox Opal, cast Glint Hawk, bounce and replay Memnite, pop the quest to suit up the goblin, swing.
